42679.summary: Some customers in the Southern area of Fernie are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
42679.title: Oct 6 – Fernie (South) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: Our crews have restored services to the area.  Thank you for your patience!
